content: crochet round yoke baby coat - crochet pattern for a baby cardigan which is quick to make ideal for everyday use or to give as a gift at a baby shower made from the neck downwards in one piece you can use three colours or just one the choice is yours the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog ** www crochetncreate com 1 ** size to fit approx - 16 inch chest 0-3 month baby level intermediate copyright ©2024 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern 1 https //crochetncreate com/round-yoke-baby-coat/
